name: outlook-encrypt-decrypt-messages
title: Encrypt and decrypt messages in Outlook
shortDescription: Use Outlook Smart Alerts and the `OnMessageRead` event to encrypt and decrypt messages.
longDescription: Use Outlook Smart Alerts and the `OnMessageRead` event to encrypt and decrypt messages.
